content:
Excellent choices! A scarf and a quick-drying travel dress are both fantastic versatile clothing items that can be used in multiple ways. The scarf can indeed be used as a blanket on the plane, and it can also add a stylish touch to your outfit. And a quick-drying travel dress is perfect for hot summer days, and it can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.

By packing these versatile items, you'll be able to create multiple outfits with just a few pieces, which will help reduce the amount of luggage you need to bring. Plus, you'll save time and energy by not having to think about what to wear every day.

Remember to also consider the activities you have planned for your trip and pack accordingly. If you're going to be engaging in outdoor activities, you may want to pack additional items like hiking boots or a waterproof jacket.

It's also a good idea to pack clothing items that can be easily mixed and matched with each other. This will give you more outfit options and make packing even more efficient.

I hope this helps, and I'm excited to hear about your trip to California!
